title: Amherst
page_copy: Listen to radio stations from Amherst NS, from a wide variety of genres like Classic Rock, Community, Country, Eclectic and Oldies.  Enjoy stations such as Tantramar FM - CFTA-FM, Harvesters FM - CITA-FM-2, KMP3 Cumberland Classics, 101.7 CKDH - CKDH-FM and more.  Come find the top new songs, playlists, and music!  Listen on your iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Android, Blackberry, and other app-enabled mobile phones.

radio_info.rest:
received approval for a new News/Talk commercial FM radio station in Halifax to operate on the frequency 95.7 MHz.[1] It launched on October 11, 2005 at 5:30 a.m.

------
Shows: ESPN Radio, Maritime Morning, Prime Time Sports, The Afternoon News, The Afternoon News, The Morning News

Hosts: Jordi Morgan, Roger Lajoie Alex Seixeiro, Zack Kooper, Tom Young

radio_info.rest:
and Live shows.

(Cbc), Health Report, Ideas, In the Key of Charles, Inside the Music, Inside Track, Laugh Out Loud, Newsline, Next Chapter (CBC), Nighttime Review, One Planet, Out Front, Q, Quirks and Quarks, Radio Australia News, Radio Polonia, Radio Prague, Radio Sweden, Randy Bachman's Vinyl Tap, Religion Report, Research File, Saturday Night Blues, Spark, Sunday Edition, Tapestry, The Choice, The Current, The Debaters, The House, The Law Report, The Monday Documentary, The Point (CBC), The Strand, The World at Six, The World This Weekend, Tonic, Vinyl Cafe, Weekend Connection, WireTap, World Report, World This Hour, Writers and Company

radio_info.short: CBC Music - CBH-FM is a Public broadcast radio station in Halifax, Nova Scotia, Canada, providing Talk shows about Canadian music scene; Classical and Jazz
radio_info.rest:
music; Indie music, including Alternative Pop, Rock, R&B and Folk music; as well as delivering the best recordings and performances from Canada's concert halls, clubs, studios and festival stages.

------

radio_info.short: The Nova Scotia Public Broadcasting Service is the nonprofit, public broadcaster in Nova Scotia. Transmitting from Broadcast House in Sydney, Nova Scotia, the radio service
radio_info.rest: operates an online channel called RadioOne, which is a general channel with a mix of classic and hit music, news, and talk radio programmes.  In its infancy it was the simply called 'The NSPB', but since the Nova Scotia Public Broadcasting Service's expansion, it was rebranded 'RadioOne'.

title: Truro
page_copy: Listen to radio stations from Truro NS, from a wide variety of genres like Alternative, Emergency & Public Safety, Rock, Scanner and Talk.  Enjoy stations such as Pure Country 99.5 - CKTY-FM, Big Dog 100.9 - CKTO-FM, HopeRadio - CINU-FM, CJIS-FM, Weatheradio Canada - XLK498 and more.  Come find the top new songs, playlists, and music!  Listen on your iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Android, Blackberry, and other app-enabled mobile phones.
